title: AVAILABLE NOW!!! Freshly reno top FL 2b1b1p w/in-unit w/d Highland Ter
posting_body: AVAILABLE NOW!!!
Freshly renovated Top Floor 2b1b1p w/in-unit w/d in Highland Terrace
Due to the volume of inquiries, please send text messages, no phone calls please.
Click “Request a tour” or “Check Availability” or “Email” with your credit score and email address, we will contact you to schedule an appointment.
Check out 3D Walkin tour:
<URL>
Unit Features:
- Top floor unit with open floor plan
- Freshly New paint throughout
- All Brand New double panes windows throughout, energy safer star
- New Insulation
- New Plumbing
- New Electricity
- Brand New Recessed lighting fixtures
- Brand New outlets with GCFI
- Freshly renovated kitchen with stylish tile and Quartz countertop
- Eat-in breakfast bar with electric outlet for your phone and laptop, and more cabinet space in the bottom of the bar
- Lot of cabinet space
- Brand New kitchen faucet and sink
- Kitchen Appliances: Refrigerator, Stainless Steel Gas Stove/Oven and Brand New Microwave
- Freshly renovated bathroom with matching tile, full size bathtub and high-end shower-heads
- Brand New Vanity Cabinet and Mirror
- In unit washer/dryer
- One gated driveway parking included
- Optional more gated parking available at $100 per month
Locations:
- Easy Freeway Access to Highway 580 and 880 to the Greater Bay Area
- 1 minute walk (66 ft) to Highland Hospital
- 1 minute walk to AC Transbay Bus to San Francisco
- 5 minute drive to Safeway, Farmers Joe's Marketplace and more
- 6 minute drive to Grand Lake Theatre, Farmers market and Grand Strip Center
Lease Terms:
- $2,300 monthly rent
- $3,000 security deposit
- Verified monthly gross household income 2.5X rent
- Credit score 700 or above
- Water, trash and parking are included
- Tenant pays electricity, gas, internet and cable
- 1 gated parking included in the rent
- Optional more gated parking available at $100 per month
- No Eviction record
- No Smoking
- Maximum 1 pet below 30 lbs, $0 Pets Deposit, $0 pet rent
- Minimum 12-month lease
- Deposit and 1st month rent due at lease signing
- Tenant required to carry renters insurance policy ($500K liability)
- Preference will be given to early move-in qualified tenants
Offered and managed by The Cal Agents Realty, DRE# 02020017
